title: Freeware release poll
content:
3drealms has a poll about which game you would like to be released as freeware

[url=http://forums.3drealms.com/ubbthreads/showflat.php?Cat=0&Number=943648&an=0&page=0#943648]forums.3drealms.com/ubbthreads/showflat.php?Cat=0&Number=943648&an=0&page=0#943648[/url]

my suggestion is that you go over & vote now
note: you must be registered as a member of the 3dr forums to vote

Um... where is the Keen 6 option? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: !!!
content: Of those, probably Bio Menace.. I'm too lazy to register.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] It'd be cool if they'd release more as freeware.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: !!!
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Joe3DR: Well, my ultimate goal is to release everything that we don't sell anymore as freeware.[hr][/quote]
I think that's a great goal.

I voted for Bio Menace.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: !!!
content:
That is an old thread, and it was mentioned here before by someone back then, so most/some people will probably have already voted.
I voted for Alien Carnage / Halloween Harry... can't vote again to also give Bio Menace one, as I'm torn between the 2, apparently indicative of the rest of the voters.
I see no news about actually releasing anything though.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: !!!
content:
I would love to see Dark Ages released as freeware. I loved the first level music in the game.Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]
Check out my fanfics at [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/u/680124/]fanfiction.net[/url]

title: Re: !!!
content:
They aren't selling K6 anymore (They never sold it in the first place if I rember correcty, but what the heck)

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: !!!
content:
Explainment:

Romero: ZOMG! Carmack wants to release Keen! He's teaming up wit Hall! We're doomed!

ID: Hmm, this is a problem, any ideas master?

Mort: Yes, release some other game as freeware, that should satisfy those seething masses for a while, in the meantime, sell Keen's licence to some poorly performing company so they both sink together!A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

-Levellord

content:

title: Delete this post by Harvey
content:
I have a lot of favorties, so why don't I just tell you which ones were just plain horrible

I don't like VGOM any more
There was an game where you were a spaceship, but had nothing to do, which was boring, I don't remember it's name
HURL was stupid
